title: The Lightning Path Institute is about to go live.
cleaned_text: The Lightning Path is a progressive educational and research institute devoted to healing and awakening the planet. Our mission is the development of new theoretical and pedagogical paradigms capable of shifting our thinking, raising our collective consciousness, and ushering in what psychologist Abraham Maslow referred to a [Eupsychia](https://spiritwiki.lightningpath.org/index.php/Eupsychia). We see a world filled with healthy, happy, empowered and fulfilled human beings, a [Eupsychia](https://spiritwiki.lightningpath.org/index.php/Eupsychia) as psychologist Abraham Maslow called it, [[1]]"Eupsychia—The Good Society." Journal of Humanistic Psychology 1, no. 2 (1961): 1. working together to improve lives, transform environments, and save the planet. We believe that [health](https://spiritwiki.lightningpath.org/index.php/health) is not merely the absence of disease or infirmity but a state of complete physical, mental, social, and spiritual well-being and connection. We believe health the way to create healthy and connected humans is to met all their essential needs. We understand that new paradigms and systems must be of the highest calibre. We undertake our mission in a peaceful, progressive, non-violent, ethical, honest, inclusive, scientifically grounded, open, and transparent way. Footnotes | |
